Saves the ToDoModel which houses all of the data about the ToDoLists.

Saves this controller which houses all the lists for the ToDo lists in the file save.dat

From Serializable uses default ID

From Serializable uses default ID
serialVersionUID - Static variable in class model.ToDoTask
From Serializable uses default ID

Changes the list's color to the given one.

Setter for the completion value of the task.

show completed task

Calls model method to show the currently completed tasks from the view.
showCompletedTask() - Method in class model.ToDoModel
Gets current list and then shows the completed tasks in that list
sort - Variable in class view.ToDoView
dropdown menu to change sorting order.
sort(String) - Method in class controller.ToDoController
Sorts the current list of task the way the given String mentions to do it.
sort(String) - Method in class model.ToDoModel
Sorts the current list by the given sorting.
sortByCreateTime() - Method in class model.ToDoList
Sorts the list of tasks by the date that the task was created.
sortByDeadline() - Method in class model.ToDoList
Sorts the list of tasks by the deadline.
sortByImportance() - Method in class model.ToDoList
Sorts the list of tasks by importance and also name.
sortByName() - Method in class model.ToDoList
Sorts the list of tasks by the name alphabetically.
start(Stage) - Method in class view.ToDoView
start() method called when application is lanched in the main method of this project and sets up the view for ToDo list.
startup - Variable in class view.ToDoView
boolean that determines if launch is initial startup of the GUI.
